channel.title: 10PRINT on Hugo Grimoire
channel.description: Recent content in 10PRINT on Hugo Grimoire

item.title: 10PRINT Image Filter
item.description: This sketch is a browser-based image filtering utility inspired by 10PRINT. The UI allows users to produce faithful looking interpretations of 10PRINT, 10PRINT patterns that look hand-drawn, and users can even create an explosive shit-mess of scribbles, if they so wish. Launch this sketch is a new window (recommended) Launch p5.js web editor
